column1: Rumphi is the capital of the Rumphi District in the Northern Region of Malawi.  It is a lively town with a market which serves the widespread tobacco farming community.
Rumphi is noted for the kindness of the people (it is even rude to pass by someone without greeting them).  It is directly on the way to Nyika National Park
